input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

runname.description: A name for the run. This will be used to name the output files.

ntc_regex.description: This is used to identify negative control samples when they are named with a different prefix. The default is 'NTC', but if no NTC is present, please use null.
